sketchoutline.tool
Class TreeMaker

java.lang.Object
  sketchoutline.tool.TreeMaker

public class TreeMaker
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for fetching and pre-processing code from the editor and calling the japa parser internally to generate a tree data structure which is accessed by the GUI.

Author:
Manindra Moharana

xyToOffset

public int xyToOffset(int x,
                      int y)
Converts a row no, column no. representation of cursor location to offset representation. Editor uses JTextArea internally which deals only with caret offset, not row no. and column no.

Parameters:
x - - row no.
y - - column no.
Returns:
int - Offset

xToOffset

public int xToOffset(int x)
Converts a row no to offset. Calls xyToOffset internally - xyToOffset(x,0)

Parameters:
x - - row no.

processPDECode

public java.lang.String processPDECode()
Fetches code from the editor tabs and pre-processes it into parsable pure java source.
Handles:
  • Removal of import statements
  • Conversion of int(), char(), etc to (int)(), (char)(), etc.
  • Replacing '#' with 0xff for color representation
  • Appends class declaration statement

    Returns:
    String - Pure java representation of PDE code

    • calculateCursorLocation

    public java.awt.Point calculateCursorLocation()
    Returns the line no and column no. from cursor offset.

    Returns:
    Point - x and y are line no and column no.

    scrubComments

    public static java.lang.String scrubComments(java.lang.String what)
    Removes comments from input String. Used from Processing source.

    Parameters:
    what - - Input String
    Returns:
    String - The processed string with comments removed.

    substituteUnicode

    public static java.lang.String substituteUnicode(java.lang.String program)
    Replaces non-ascii characters with their unicode escape sequences and stuff. Used as it is from /processing/src/processing/mode/java/preproc/PdePreprocessor

    Parameters:
    program - - Input String containing non ascii characters
    Returns:
    String - Converted String
